name: Save Guard
description:
A Sergeant got stuck on a distant island with his squad. He agrees to escort some noble persons to make money and get the hell out this place. What can go wrong? Find out!

Controls:

A, D -rotate 

LMB - pick guardian and shoot

*choose your enemies carefully
